title: Ordering Food at a Restaurant
introduction: In this lesson, we'll cover a simple exchange about ordering food at a restaurant in Brazilian Portuguese.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Boa noite, eu gostaria de ver o cardápio, por favor.
story.translation: Good evening, I would like to see the menu, please.

story.message: 'Gostaria de' is a polite way of expressing a desire or preference in Portuguese, similar to 'would like to' in English.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.translation: Of course, here is the menu.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Eu vou querer a feijoada, por favor.
story.translation: I will have the feijoada, please.

tests.prompt: I would like to see the menu.
tests.answer: Eu gostaria de ver o cardápio.
